StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetMIContract]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@NwaId int AS BEGIN
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
SELECT NWA_ID, CONTRACT_BEGIN_DATE, COMPONENT_CODE, PROJECTED_SHIP_DATE, PROJECTED_TRAINING_ORG_ID, TERM_OF_ENLISTMENT FROM [MCRISS].[dbo].[MIContract] WHERE NWA_ID = @NwaId
END
